email_text:
Subject: Important Message Regarding Your Student Loans

Dear [Name],

We are reaching out to inform you about a new loan forgiveness program that has recently been implemented by the Department of Education. As a valued student loan borrower, you may be eligible to have a portion of your loans forgiven through this program.

This forgiveness program is designed to help individuals who are struggling to make their monthly loan payments and provide them with financial relief. By participating in this program, you could potentially have thousands of dollars in student loan debt forgiven.

In order to determine your eligibility and take advantage of this opportunity, we kindly ask that you provide us with some basic information about your loans. Please click on the link below to fill out the forgiveness application form and submit it for review:

[Phishing link]

Please note that this program is only available for a limited time, so we encourage you to act quickly in order to secure your eligibility for loan forgiveness.

If you have any questions or concerns about this program, feel free to contact us at [fake contact information] and one of our representatives will be happy to assist you.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter.

Sincerely,
Dept. of Education Loan Forgiveness Program
